name: ZERO-NINE (0-9)
description:
0-9 is a casual, simplistic game that is meant to fill your time when you get bored.

The idea behind the game is to press the number keys above the alphabet keys, but only the key displayed on your screen.

In this release we will only have the lite version of the game available, along the way integrating interested updates to improve the game.

Controls:

~ The number keys above the alphabet keys
